Edmonton's best boardgame cafe

Tabletop cafe is special blend of coffee shop, board game library and retail store.

About us

The perfect place to come together and get your game on

Whether you're bringing a group of friends or just looking to drop in and play some games, our space provides a fun and casual atmosphere that accomodates seasoned gamers and newcomers alike.

Full Library of Games

With over 100+ board games to choose from, we have something to please everyone.

Games For Sale

Want to continue your adventure at home? We have a wide selection of games for sale.

Food & Drink

We've got a full menu of food and drink so the only thing you'll have to worry about is your next game move.
